Summary: Sky lit up bright (and I mean bright) orange, power went out for 30 seconds, lound "grinding" sound followed lights
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around September 30th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front porch having a cigarette when all of a sudden the entire sky as far as I could see lit up bright orange, when the light went away the power went off for about 30 seconds, then there was a loud "grinding" sound, it was not thunder and lightning, I then called my son outside to observe and it happened again in the same sequence (light, power, sound) and then the power came back on normal and no more noise or light. I would also like to note that even the street lights surged in power for a minute?
